accessorInfo.name: Rhein-Main-Verkehrsverbund GmbH
accessorInfo.description: Provides departure information for 'Rhine-Main' in Germany. It uses an XML source for departure information and HTML for stop autocompletion.

changelog.entry: Port to a script using qt.xml extension (almost copy'n'paste).
Fix departures/arrivals (also without stop ID, decoding).
Ported the stop suggestion part to a script.
Stop suggestions didn't work, because the HTML accessor that parses stop suggestions for XML accessors was initialized with empty accessor info.
